verses.verse: God, <S%H430><s%> don't <S%H1824><s%> keep silent. Don't <S%H1824><s%> keep silent, and don't <S%H8252><s%> be still, God. <S%H410><s%>
For, <S%H341><s%> behold, your enemies are stirred <S%H1993><s%> up. <S%H8130><s%> Those who hate you have lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>
They conspire <S%H5475><s%> with cunning <S%H6191><s%> against your people. <S%H5971><s%> They plot <S%H3289><s%> against your cherished ones. <S%H6845><s%>

"Come, <S%H3212><s%>" they say, <S%H559><s%> "and let <S%H3582><s%>'s destroy them as a nation, <S%H1471><s%> that the name <S%H8034><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may be remembered no more. <S%H2142><s%>"
For they have conspired <S%H3289><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> with one mind. <S%H3820><s%> They form <S%H3772><s%> an alliance against you. <S%H1285><s%>
The tents <S%H168><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> and the Ishmaelites; <S%H3459><s%> Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the Hagrites; <S%H1905><s%>
Gebal, <S%H1381><s%> Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and Amalek; <S%H6002><s%> Philistia <S%H6429><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Tyre; <S%H6865><s%>
Assyria <S%H804><s%> also is joined <S%H3867><s%> with them. <S%H2220><s%> They have helped the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot. <S%H3876><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Do <S%H6213><s%> to them as you did to Midian, <S%H4080><s%> as to Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> as to Jabin, <S%H2985><s%> at the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon; <S%H7028><s%>
who perished <S%H8045><s%> at Endor, <S%H5874><s%> who became as dung <S%H1828><s%> for the earth. <S%H127><s%>
Make <S%H7896><s%> their nobles <S%H5081><s%> like Oreb <S%H6159><s%> and Zeeb; <S%H2062><s%> yes, <S%H5257><s%> all their princes like Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna; <S%H6759><s%>
who said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us take possession <S%H3423><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>'s pasturelands. <S%H4999><s%>"
My God, <S%H430><s%> make <S%H7896><s%> them like tumbleweed; <S%H1534><s%> like chaff <S%H7179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wind. <S%H7307><s%>
As the fire <S%H784><s%> that burns <S%H1197><s%> the forest, <S%H3293><s%> as the flame <S%H3852><s%> that sets <S%H3857><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> on fire, <S%H3857><s%>
so pursue <S%H7291><s%> them with your tempest, <S%H5591><s%> and terrify <S%H926><s%> them with your storm. <S%H5492><s%>
Fill <S%H4390><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> with confusion, <S%H7036><s%> that they may seek <S%H1245><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Let them be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and dismayed <S%H926><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%> Yes, <S%H2659><s%> let them be confounded and perish; <S%H6><s%>
that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that you alone, <S%H8034><s%> whose name is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> are the Most High <S%H5945><s%> over all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
